article_id: whatreallyhappened--2020-11-08--CRISPR gene-editing mistake results in over a dozen mutant embryos
subject: controversial gene-editing device
object: unwittingly created more than a dozen mutant human embryos
claim: Scientists using a controversial gene-editing device unwittingly created more than a dozen mutant human embryos, according to a new study.
id: whatreallyhappened--2020-11-08--CRISPR gene-editing mistake results in over a dozen mutant embryos

article_id: globalresearch--2020-04-20--Trump Admin Furloughed 4,000 Korean Workers in the Midst of a Pandemic to Punish South Korea
subject: COVID 19 pandemic
claim: Forces in Korea (USFK) has furloughed about half of USFK 8,500 local hires, not for fear of the COVID 19 pandemic, but in a ploy to extract more subsidies from the South Korean government, using workers as pawns.
id: globalresearch--2020-04-20--Trump Admin Furloughed 4,000 Korean Workers in the Midst of a Pandemic to Punish South Korea
